body:
My weird DNP dream

Lol ok so I had a dream last night that dnp we’re practicing their tour again and Phil’s brother posted abt on instagram and it had the caption “I loved watching ii again with Dan’s wife” and I was like wtf then I woke up lmao

tags: hi dan hope youre safe and warm
summary: my style may be all over the place but dan is one of my favorite people to draw and i love these. it’s stupid cheesy but dan...
body:
my style may be all over the place but dan is one of my favorite people to draw and i love these. it’s stupid cheesy but dan inspiring me to draw all the time made me realize my love of drawing portraits and i’m actually kind of good at it and i’m just really grateful 🖤👻

@danielhowell ✨🌙🌌🌄🌻🌸⭐️💫

blog.name: foundwhereibelong-thephandom
blog.title: I'm a 'Phan'girl
blog.description: I may not have been here since the beginning, but better late to the party than never to have shown up at all.

summary: I'm sad... again lol
body:
I’m sad… again lol

So last summer, almost a year ago, I made a post called “I’m sad…” and it was about how my mum wouldn’t let me go see Interactive Introverts. Well buckle up botches because it’s happening again.

In three months I turn eighteen and originally I wanted to go to a concert for my birthday and my mum was going to let me but then she read some bad reviews and it was a no go. So when I found out @amazingphil and @danielhowell were going to be at VidCon this year I got super excited and realized the tickets were CHEAPER than the ones for the concert. So, being all nice and full of hope, I asked my mum if I could go to VidCon and she asked what it was. So I explained what it was and that all my favorites will be there. David Dobrik, The Try Guys, Dan and Phil, and more. She looked at me like I’m literally insane and decided to not even let me finish explaining that going to vidcon is all I want for my birthday. She told me no and now I’m upsetti spaghetti and need a fat nap all the time.

Dan and Phil changed my life. I wanted a chance to meet them and tell them that. Hopefully I’ll have another opportunity to do so and maybe by that point I’ll have the cat whiskers tattooed on my wrist or my hip (I haven’t decided where yet).

Thanks for reading rant I appreciate it.

Oh, and before I forget. I don’t know you but you somehow made it through this psycho fangirl rant and that means you are truly amazing, powerful, and beautiful. So, to quote the great Daniel Howell: “Embrace the void and have the courage to exist.” To any of you who are struggling or crumbling, just know that the phandom is here for you.
